metadata.title: CVE-2017-16661 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cacti 1.1.27 allows remote authenticated administrators to read arbitraryfiles by placing the Log Path into a private directory, and then making aclog.php?filename= request, as demonstrated by filename=passwd (with a LogPath under /etc) to read /etc/passwd.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16661` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1').
